name: The World of Assets
description: Welcome to the World of Assets, an empty ass crossing of a few rooms floating in space.  Having arrived after downloading a bunch of free assets having trouble coming up with ideas to make a game,  it is your task to collect all the USB Hard Drives to install a virus on the laptop to escape this empty shell of a product.  Explore really terribly designed puzzles with your Scientifically Accurate Laser Blaster that you can't see it hitting its targets, and waste many minutes of your precious time .  Play the game once and let it rot on your hard drive wasting space until you remember to uninstall it. All for the low low price of FREE.
